56163.name: Glyph of Dispel Magic

56164.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fade spell by 9 sec.
56164.name: Glyph of Fade

56165.description: Reduces cooldown and duration of Fear Ward by 60 sec.
56165.name: Glyph of Fear Ward

56166.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal on targets at or below 25% health by 10%.
56166.name: Glyph of Flash Heal

56167.description: Reduces the global cooldown of your Holy Nova by .5 sec.
56167.name: Glyph of Holy Nova

56168.description: Increases the armor from your Inner Fire spell by 50%.
56168.name: Glyph of Inner Fire

56169.description: Increases the total amount of charges of your Lightwell by 5.
56169.name: Glyph of Lightwell

56170.description: Reduces the cast time of Mass Dispel by 1 sec.
56170.name: Glyph of Mass Dispel

56171.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Horror by 30 sec.
56171.name: Glyph of Psychic Horror

56172.description: Increases the periodic damage of your Shadow Word: Pain by 10%.
56172.name: Glyph of Shadow Word: Pain

56174.description: Increases the healing received while under the Barrier by 10%.
56174.name: Glyph of Power Word: Barrier

56175.description: Your Power Word: Shield also heals the target for 20% of the absorption amount.
56175.name: Glyph of Power Word: Shield

56176.description: Your Prayer of Healing spell also heals an additional 20% of its initial heal over 6 sec.
56176.name: Glyph of Prayer of Healing

56177.description: Targets of your Psychic Scream spell now tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear, but the cooldown of Psychic Scream is increased by 3 sec.
56177.name: Glyph of Psychic Scream

56178.description: Increases the amount healed by your Renew by an additional 10%.
56178.name: Glyph of Renew

56179.description: Reduces the cast time of your Shackle Undead by 1 sec.
56179.name: Glyph of Scourge Imprisonment

56180.description: If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill the target at or below 25% health, your Shadow Word: Death's cooldown is instantly reset.  This effect cannot occur more often than once every 6 sec.
56180.name: Glyph of Shadow Word: Death

56181.description: Increases the damage done by your Mind Flay spell by 10%.
56181.name: Glyph of Mind Flay

56182.description: Your Smite spell inflicts an additional 20% damage against targets afflicted by Holy Fire.
56182.name: Glyph of Smite

56183.description: The first charge of your Prayer of Mending heals for an additional 60%.
56183.name: Glyph of Prayer of Mending

55552.description: Causes your Totemic Recall ability to return an additional 50% of the mana cost of any recalled totems.
55552.name: Glyph of Totemic Recall

55553.description: Your Lightning Shield can no longer drop below 3 charges from dealing damage to attackers.
55553.name: Glyph of Lightning Shield

55554.description: Increases the damage dealt by Lightning Bolt by 4%.
55554.name: Glyph of Lightning Bolt

55558.description: Instead of absorbing a spell, your Grounding Totem reflects the next harmful spell back at its caster, but the cooldown of your Grounding Totem is increased by 45 sec.
55558.name: Glyph of Grounding Totem

55559.description: Increases the critical strike chance bonus from your Stormstrike ability by an additional 10%.
55559.name: Glyph of Stormstrike

55560.description: Increases the damage dealt by your Lava Lash ability by 20%.
55560.name: Glyph of Lava Lash

55561.description: While your Elemental Mastery ability is active, you take 20% less damage from all sources.
55561.name: Glyph of Elemental Mastery

55562.description: Increases the chance per swing for Windfury Weapon to trigger by 2%.
55562.name: Glyph of Windfury Weapon

58263.description: Your Reincarnation spell no longer requires a reagent.
58263.name: Glyph of Renewed Life

58260.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Astral Recall spell by 7.5 min.
58260.name: Glyph of Astral Recall

58261.description: Alters the appearance of your Ghost Wolf transformation, causing it to resemble an arctic wolf.
58261.name: Glyph of the Arctic Wolf

59287.description: Your Ghost Wolf form grants an additional 5% movement speed.
59287.name: Glyph of Ghost Wolf

58264.description: Your Water Breathing spell no longer requires a reagent.
58264.name: Glyph of Water Breathing

58265.description: Your Water Walking spell no longer requires a reagent.
58265.name: Glyph of Water Walking

63902.description: Reduces the cooldown on Thunderstorm by 10 sec.
63902.name: Glyph of Thunder

63903.description: Your spirit wolves gain an additional 30% of your attack power.
63903.name: Glyph of Feral Spirit

63904.description: Increases the duration of Riptide by 40%.
63904.name: Glyph of Riptide

63925.description: Increases the amount healed by your Earth Shield by 20%.
63925.name: Glyph of Earth Shield

63926.description: Activating your Shamanistic Rage ability also cleanses you of all dispellable Magic debuffs.
63926.name: Glyph of Shamanistic Rage

63927.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hex spell by 15 sec.
63927.name: Glyph of Hex

63929.description: Your Stoneclaw Totem also places a damage absorb shield on you, equal to 4 times the strength of the shield it places on your totems.
63929.name: Glyph of Stoneclaw Totem

62133.description: Increases the mana you receive from your Thunderstorm spell by 2%, but it no longer knocks enemies back.
62133.name: Glyph of Thunderstorm

55535.description: Increases the passive mana regeneration of your Water Shield spell by 50%.
55535.name: Glyph of Water Shield

55537.description: Increases healing done by your Chain Heal spell to targets beyond the first by 15%, but decreases the amount received by the initial target by 10%.
55537.name: Glyph of Chain Heal

55538.description: Your Chain Lightning spell now strikes 2 additional targets, but deals 10% less initial damage.
55538.name: Glyph of Chain Lightning

55539.description: Your Lava Burst spell deals 10% more damage.
55539.name: Glyph of Lava Burst

55540.description: Reduces the global cooldown triggered by your shock spells to 1 sec.
55540.name: Glyph of Shocking

55541.description: Increases the effectiveness of your Earthliving weapon's periodic healing by 20%.
55541.name: Glyph of Earthliving Weapon

55542.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Elemental Totem by 5 min.
55542.name: Glyph of Fire Elemental Totem

55544.description: Increases the radius of your Fire Nova spell by 5 yards.
55544.name: Glyph of Fire Nova

55545.description: Increases the duration of your Flame Shock by 50%.
55545.name: Glyph of Flame Shock

55546.description: Increases spell critical strike chance by 2% while Flametongue Weapon is active.
55546.name: Glyph of Flametongue Weapon

55547.description: Increases the duration of your Frost Shock by 2 sec.
55547.name: Glyph of Frost Shock

55548.description: Your Healing Stream Totem also increases the Fire, Frost, and Nature resistance of party and raid members within 10 yards by [if (PL<=70) then PL else if (PL<=80) then PL+(PL-70)*5 else PL+(PL-70)*5+(PL-80)*7].
55548.name: Glyph of Healing Stream Totem

55551.description: Your Healing Wave also heals you for 20% of the healing effect when you heal someone else.
55551.name: Glyph of Healing Wave

63958.description: Increases the damage or healing done by Death Coil by 15%.
63958.name: Glyph of Death Coil

58713.description: Increases the range of your Death Grip ability by 5 yards.
58713.name: Glyph of Death Grip

59311.description: When your Death Grip ability fails because its target is immune, its cooldown is reset.
59311.name: Glyph of Resilient Grip

59312.description: Your Path of Frost ability allows you to fall from a greater distance without suffering damage.
59312.name: Glyph of Path of Frost

59313.description: Increases the health of your Risen Ally by 25% and its run speed by 15%.
59313.name: Glyph of Raise Ally

59328.description: Your Rune Tap also heals your party for 5% of their maximum health.
59328.name: Glyph of Rune Tap

59333.description: Increases the radius of your Blood Boil ability by 50%.
59333.name: Glyph of Blood Boil

59337.description: Increases your Death Strike's damage by 2% for every 5 runic power you currently have (up to a maximum of 40%).  The runic power is not consumed by this effect.
59337.name: Glyph of Death Strike

63953.description: Increases your threat generation by 50% while your Dancing Rune Weapon is active.
63953.name: Glyph of Dancing Rune Weapon

63954.description: Your Hungering Cold ability no longer costs runic power.
63954.name: Glyph of Hungering Cold

58707.description: Your Blood Tap no longer causes damage to you.
58707.name: Glyph of Blood Tap

58708.description: Increases your movement speed by 15% while Bone Shield is active.  This does not stack with other movement-speed increasing effects.
58708.name: Glyph of Bone Shield

58709.description: Your Chains of Ice also causes 144 to 156 Frost damage, with additional damage depending on your attack power.
58709.name: Glyph of Chains of Ice

58710.description: Increases the duration of your Death and Decay spell by 50%.
58710.name: Glyph of Death and Decay

58711.description: Your Death Coil refunds 20 runic power when used to heal an allied minion.
58711.name: Glyph of Death's Embrace

63961.description: Your Howling Blast ability now infects your targets with Frost Fever.
63961.name: Glyph of Howling Blast

58715.description: Reduces the cost of your Frost Strike by 8 Runic Power.
58715.name: Glyph of Frost Strike

58716.description: Increases the duration of your Horn of Winter ability by 1 min.
58716.name: Glyph of Horn of Winter

58718.description: Your Frost Fever disease deals 20% additional damage.
58718.name: Glyph of Icy Touch

58719.description: Increases the damage of your Obliterate ability by 20%.
58719.name: Glyph of Obliterate

58720.description: Increases the radius of your Pestilence effect by 5 yards.
58720.name: Glyph of Pestilence

58721.description: Your Ghoul receives an additional 40% of your Strength and 40% of your Stamina.
58721.name: Glyph of Raise Dead

58722.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Rune Strike by 10%.
58722.name: Glyph of Rune Strike

58723.description: Increases the Shadow damage portion of your Scourge Strike by 30%.
58723.name: Glyph of Scourge Strike

58724.description: Increases the Silence duration of your Strangulate ability by 2 sec when used on a target who is casting a spell.
58724.name: Glyph of Strangulate

58725.description: Empowers your Pillar of Frost, making you immune to all effects that cause loss of control of your character, but also freezing you in place while the ability is active.
58725.name: Glyph of Pillar of Frost

58726.description: Increases the bonus healing received while your Vampiric Blood is active by an additional 15%, but your Vampiric Blood no longer grants you health.
58726.name: Glyph of Vampiric Blood

58705.description: Increases the duration of your Anti-Magic Shell by 2 sec.
58705.name: Glyph of Anti-Magic Shell

58706.description: Increases the damage of your Heart Strike ability by 30%.
58706.name: Glyph of Heart Strike

58241.description: Your Slow Fall spell no longer requires a reagent.
58241.name: Glyph of Slow Fall

56587.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fireball spell by 5%.
56587.name: Glyph of Fireball

56589.description: Your Frost Nova targets can take an additional 20% damage before the Frost Nova effect automatically breaks.
56589.name: Glyph of Frost Nova

56590.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Frostbolt spell by 5%.
56590.name: Glyph of Frostbolt

56591.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Pyroblast spell by 5%.
56591.name: Glyph of Pyroblast

56592.description: Your Frost Nova cooldown is now reset every time you use Ice Block.
56592.name: Glyph of Ice Block

56593.description: Increases the damage of your Ice Lance spell by 5%.
56593.name: Glyph of Ice Lance

56594.description: Your Icy Veins ability also removes all movement slowing and cast time slowing effects.
56594.name: Glyph of Icy Veins

56596.description: Increases your movement speed while Invisible by 40%.
56596.name: Glyph of Invisibility

56597.description: Your Mage Armor regenerates 20% more mana.
56597.name: Glyph of Mage Armor

61206.description: Increases the damage done by your Frostfire Bolt by 15% and your Frostfire Bolt now deals 3% additional damage over 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times, but no longer reduces the victim's movement speed.
61206.name: Glyph of Frostfire

56599.description: Your Molten Armor grants an additional 2% spell critical strike chance.
56599.name: Glyph of Molten Armor

56600.description: Your Polymorph spell also removes all damage over time effects from the target.
56600.name: Glyph of Polymorph

56601.description: Increases the damage of your Cone of Cold spell by 25%.
56601.name: Glyph of Cone of Cold

70938.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Mana Shield by 2 sec.
70938.name: Glyph of Mana Shield

56602.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Dragon's Breath by 3 sec.
56602.name: Glyph of Dragon's Breath

58271.description: Your Drain Soul restores 10% of your total mana after you kill a target that yields experience or honor.
58271.name: Glyph of Drain Soul

62127.description: Increases the duration of Blast Wave's slowing effect by 1 sec.
62127.name: Glyph of Blast Wave

89927.description: Increases the damage of your Living Bomb spell by 3%.
89927.name: Glyph of Living Bomb

56542.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Missiles spell by 5%.
56542.name: Glyph of Arcane Missiles

56544.description: While Arcane Power is active the global cooldown of your Blink, Mana Shield, and Mirror Image is reduced to zero.
56544.name: Glyph of Arcane Power

56546.description: Increases the distance you travel with the Blink spell by 5 yards.
56546.name: Glyph of Blink

56547.description: Your Evocation ability also causes you to regain 40% of your health over its duration.
56547.name: Glyph of Evocation

62353.description: Increases the damage from your Arcane Blast buff by 3%.
62353.name: Glyph of Arcane Blast

63859.description: Your Deep Freeze deals 20% additional damage.
63859.name: Glyph of Deep Freeze

63860.description: Increases the range of your Slow spell by 5 yards.
63860.name: Glyph of Slow

63862.description: Increases the damage of your Arcane Barrage spell by 4%.
63862.name: Glyph of Arcane Barrage

63863.description: Your Mirror Images cast Arcane Blast or Fireball instead of Frostbolt depending on your primary talent tree.
63863.name: Glyph of Mirror Image

63864.description: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Ice Barrier by 30%.
63864.name: Glyph of Ice Barrier

89748.description: Increases the duration of your Armor spells by 30 min.
89748.name: Glyph of Armors

58235.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Arcane Brilliance spell by 50%.
58235.name: Glyph of Arcane Brilliance

58237.description: Your Polymorph: Sheep spell polymorphs the target into a monkey instead.
58237.name: Glyph of the Monkey

58238.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Conjuring spells by 50%.
58238.name: Glyph of Conjuring
